change_language.message: You can always change this setting here. Simply select English or Spanish.

send_feedback.message: Found an error? Would you like to contact the app owner? Just send a message.
send_feedback.subtitle: Change Experience level

change_level.title: Change Experience Level
change_level.message:
Is it too hard or maybe too easy?

change_level.subtitle: Change Experience level

saved.message:

no_connection.title: Could not connect to the server

error.title: Something unexpected happened
error.message:
We are working to fix this issue
Please try again later

unavailable.title: This section is only available in English

question_one.question: How do I get more words?
question_one.title: A simple solution
question_one.answer: To get more words, tap the refresh button on the top right corner or just slide your finger down.

question_one_2.question: What does each color mean?
question_one_2.title: Each color represents a grammatical category
question_one_2.answer: If you ever see a purple word, it means it has more than one grammatical category or it may even be the same word with different colors.

sentence.question: What is a Sentence?
sentence.title: A set of words
sentence.answer: A sentence is a set of words used to express an idea or thought. Examples: The man is running. I am learning another language.

singular.question: What does singular mean?
singular.title: A single object
singular.answer: Singular expresses a single unit of the beings or objects referred to.

plural.question: What does plural mean?
plural.title: More than one object
plural.answer: Plural refers to more than one thing.

antonyms.question: What are antonyms?
antonyms.title: Opposite words
antonyms.answer: Antonyms are those words whose meanings are opposite.

synonyms.question: What are synonyms?
synonyms.title: Similar words
synonyms.answer: Synonyms are words that have the same meaning as other words.

subject.question: What is a subject?
subject.title: Who we talk about
subject.answer: The subject is the person, animal or thing discussed in a sentence.

phasal_verbs.question: What are phrasal verbs?
phasal_verbs.title: Its meaning is not obvious.
phasal_verbs.answer: These are the verbs composed by the main verb and an adverb or proposition.

verb.question: Verbs
verb.title: Every action
verb.answer: A verb shows action or state of being; It's the part of the sentence that expresses the subject's action.

noun.question: Nouns
noun.title: Persons, objects, ideas or places.
noun.answer: A word used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things.

adjective.question: Adjective
adjective.title: A description of a noun.
adjective.answer: Adjectives describe nouns by modifying them. They can specify color, size, number, etc.

idioms.question: What is Colloquialism?
idioms.title: A word or phrase that is not formal
idioms.answer: Idioms/phrases/slang are expressions of every language that if translated literally, would not make sense.

adverb.question: Adverb
adverb.title: Words which describe verbs or adjectives
adverb.answer: Adverbs specifies in what manner, when, how much, and where.

not_found.question: Couldn't find what you were looking for?
not_found.title: Send Feedback!
not_found.subtitle: You can send a request to add new features or new content, tap here to open send a request

no_words.title: Words are not showing up!
no_words.subtitle: I always get the message: Couldn't connect to the server
no_words.solution_one: One reason could be that internet connection may be failing or is very slow, please check the internet connection. If it doesn't work, try again later.

no_server.title: I've reached my free tier usage!
no_server.subtitle: Free quota reached
no_server.response_one: Each user has a limit quota
no_server.solution_one: You can make up to 100 requests every 5 hours, if you already made 100 requests, the app won't work in the next 5 hours. You can always use the web version that has no limits.

voice.title: There is no pronunciation!
voice.subtitle: The voice depends on your internet speed.
voice.solution_one: The audio file comes from very far away servers! It may take a while to load, make sure you have a good Internet connection

no_volume.title: I can't hear anything!
no_volume.subtitle: In some devices, the application may show strange behavior, but you can solve it with the following steps.
no_volume.solution_one: This application could take a while to respond, it may take up to 20 seconds, please be patient.
no_volume.solution_two: It might be obvious, but have you tried increasing the volume?
no_volume.solution_three: It is might be possible that you have activated the 'Do not disturb' mode. Try turning it off
no_volume.solution_four: If none of this works, you have two options, your phone may have a speaker that does not work or your device is not compatible with the application.

missing_files.title: Missing files
missing_files.subtitle: Did you clean your phone?
missing_files.solution_one: If you recently cleaned your phone, you might have deleted the audio files stored in your phone. Please try to not delete the cache memory from this app.

developer.title: Application developed by Joshua García
developer.subtitle: We'll keep adding more content and features to the app.

content.title: Gifs provided by Giphy
content.title_two: Tap to find out more about Giphy
content.subtitle: Joshua García is not the owner of any gifs shown in this app.
